item.description:
Our meetups will usually be held on the 1st and 3rd Wednesday's each month!
Come and join the fun of practising Chinese conversations!

Same format as the usual, we'll go around the room to ask each participant to make a speech in both Chinese and English, usually do an introduction of yourself, and get the conversations going.

New Hanyu Pinyin Made Easy! postings on our Message Board, join, discuss, and participate!

Also, just ran across www.iqchinese.com, try their free download demo for IQChinese Pinyin,
very slick!

I just launched Help2LearnChinese Group on Facebook! So, please join if you're on Facebook;)
item.how_to_find_us: Check with the librarian, either Hunt Conference room or Media Area in basement.
item.name: Help2LearnChinese April's 1st-Wednesday Meetup
